price: 23. Oo la keeno Maalintaas Naarta. Maalintaas buu Aadmigu (gaalku) waansami, maxayse waantoobidda (markaa) u tari?
arabic: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wajīa yawma-idhin bijahannama yawma-idhin yatadhakkaru al-insānu wa-annā lahu al-dhik'rā
